020
021import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.CurrencyFormatter;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
026
027import java.math.BigDecimal;
028import java.util.Iterator;
029import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.UUID;
032
033/**
034 * TopPage
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039public class TopPage<V> {
040
041  private final LinkedHashMap<V, BigDecimal> values = new LinkedHashMap<>();
042
043  private final int page;
044
045  public TopPage(final int page) {
046
047    this.page = page;
048  }
049
050  public LinkedHashMap<V, BigDecimal> getValues() {
051
052    return values;
053  }
054
055  public V getAt(final int pos) {
056
057    if(pos > values.size()) return (V)"no one";
058
059    final Iterator<Map.Entry<V, BigDecimal>> it = values.entrySet().iterator();
060
061    int i = 0;
062    while(it.hasNext()) {
063      if(pos - 1 == i) {
064        return it.next().getKey();
065      }
066
067      it.next();
068      i++;
069    }
070    return (V)"no one";
071  }
072
073  public MessageData getFor(final int pos, final UUID currency) {
074
075    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.PlaceholderTopEntry");
076    data.addReplacement("$toppos", String.valueOf(pos));
077    data.addReplacement("$account", "no one");
078    data.addReplacement("$balance", "0");
079
080    if(pos > values.size()) {
081      return data;
082    }
083
084    final Iterator<Map.Entry<V, BigDecimal>> it = values.entrySet().iterator();
085
086    int i = 0;
087    while(it.hasNext()) {
088      if(pos - 1 == i) {
089        data.addReplacement("$account", (String)it.next().getKey());
090        data.addReplacement("$balance", CurrencyFormatter.format(null, new HoldingsEntry(PluginCore.server().defaultWorld(), currency, it.next().getValue(), EconomyManager.NORMAL)));
091        return data;
092      }
093
094      it.next();
095      i++;
096    }
097    return data;
098  }
099
100  public int getPage() {
101
102    return page;
103  }
104}
